name: ATCG (Retorikal, OreTheCoconut, pillowrd)
description:
Face the marching skeleton threat with your magical deck of cards in this unorthodox tower defense game! Drop your tower cards near gems and watch them evolve into stronger forms! Try to keep your base alive for as long as possible to gain even more power, but beware, you're not the only one getting stronger.

Mouse 1 - Place Selected Turret
Mouse 2 - Drop Selected Card
Scroll Wheel - Select Cards
